items.q: How do you estimate the best time to buy?
items.a: We monitor inventory, price reductions, days-on-market trends, and comparable sales context. Timing still depends on your goals and constraints.

items.q: How quickly will I hear about new listings?
items.a: Hot Sheet subscribers receive weekly updates every Monday. High-match listings trigger immediate priority alerts.

items.q: Is there a cost to join the Hot Sheet?
items.a: No. The Hot Sheet is free. We only earn commission when you buy or sell through us.

items.q: What makes your off-market access different?
items.a: We combine relationship-driven network access with AI-driven market signals, so you know when to act - not just what's available.
